Content: 16 Army personnel of the Security Force Headquarters – Central (SFHQ-Cen) on the instructions of Major General Ruwan De Silva, Commander, Security Forces – Central Thursday (14) morning rushed to Makulu Ella, Allimale area and brought a fast spreading bush fire under control in cooperation with 10 employees of the Wild Life Conservation Department. Similarly, 2 more such bush fires that irrupted in the Bandarawela Divisional Secretariat area were extinguished by SFHQ-Cen troops earlier this week.
